sn35.242:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kimilayam viharati gangaya nadiya tire.
sn35.242:1.2: Addasa kho bhagava mahantam darukkhandham gangaya nadiya sotena vuyhamanam.
sn35.242:1.4: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amum mahantam darukkhandham gangaya nadiya sotena vuyhamanan”ti?
sn35.242:1.6: evam vutte, ayasma kimilo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.242:1.9: Idha, kimila, bhikkhu annataram sankilittham apattim apanno hoti yatharupaya apattiya na vutthanam pannayati.
